example.parse: (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN امرار) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المفاهيم) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاميركية)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المعادية) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نضال) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطني) (CONJ و) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN القومي)))))))))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عبر) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN تدريس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-DTV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN طلاب) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المفاهيم) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC المضللة))) (SBAR (SBAR (WHNP-3 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تشوه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC التاريخ)))))

arg.g: these misleading concepts that distort history
